QuestData.Title: A Funeral
QuestData.Description:
As I said, I will gather the town - we will be at the funeral.
As the one who has done so much to honor our friends, we feel it is only right that you will be the one to light the Incense of Life and usher their spirits to the life beyond.
QuestData.LogDescription: Attend the funeral and light the Incense of Life.
QuestData.CompletionText: You must light the incense to honor the dead.
QuestData.RewardText: Good. Let us begin the funeral.
